articles.title: Donald Trump to cut off funding for South Africa over land seizure policy - BBC.com
articles.description: South Africa last month passed a law allowing the seizure of land under certain circumstances.
articles.content:
Basillioh Rukanga in Nairobi & Khanyisile Ngcobo in Johannesburg
US President Donald Trump has said he will cut all future funding to South Africa over allegations that it was confiscating land … [+3654 chars]
